pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the President of Togo, Faure Essozimna Gnassingbé | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the President of Togo, Faure Essozimna Gnassingbé.

The Prime Minister welcomed Togo’s efforts to promote peace and stability in the region. The two leaders looked forward to strengthening bilateral relations and cooperation on issues of shared concern.
